titles.title: Heavy Truck Tax Fairness Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on heavy trucks and trailers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Heavy Truck Tax Fairness Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) repeal the excise tax on heavy trucks and trailers sold at retail; (2) increase the rate of tax on diesel fuel or kerosene to 31.6 cents per gallon; and (3) impose a floor stocks tax with respect to certain taxable fuels..
